item.description:
Let's get out of hibernation for Valentines Day and go check out Ward Reservatiions Winter Fun Days.
Ward Winter Fun Day:
Winter is a delightful season to experience the trails at Ward Reservation, parts of which reside in Andover and North Andover. The Trustees of Reservations and Ward Reservation Property Committee, in partnership with the Andover Trails Committee, Friends of North Andover Trails and Moor & Mountain of Andover will host a Winter Fun Day, which will take place on Sunday February 14th from 12:00 – 3:00 PM. The event will take place with or without snow on the ground. This is a free event.

Short to medium length guided hikes to different destinations on the reservation will leave periodically throughout the afternoon. Cross country skiing, snowshoeing, sledding, refreshments and a warming fire will be available throughout the afternoon. Limited instruction for cross-country skiing and snowshoeing will also be available.

If you’ve never been on cross-country skis or snowshoes, this is a great opportunity to give them a try. Moor & Mountain in Andover will have snowshoes and ski equipment available for rent. For prices and specifics on pick-up and drop-off times please call 978.475.3665. Rentals are first come-first served.

Parking at the reservation entrance on Prospect Road, east of Route 125, in Andover
item.how_to_find_us: I will be standing next to my car (black Nissan Altima) in the parking lot
item.name: Winter Days at Ward Reservation
